item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>I know it doesn't sound very likely does it. I'm sure I just haven't encountered the politics yet but I'm in no rush to, it's just a refreshing change at the moment from the usual fun and games.</p>
item.content:encoded: I know it doesn’t sound very likely does it. I’m sure I just haven’t encountered the politics yet but I’m in no rush to, it’s just a refreshing change at the moment from the usual fun and games.

item.title: By: Ben Poole
item.dc:creator: Ben Poole
item.description: <p>An environment that lets you get on with it...</p><p>Without politics...</p><p><img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJ8/$FILE/shocked.gif"</a>> </p>
item.content:encoded:
An environment that lets you get on with it…

Without politics…

http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJ8/$FILE/shocked.gif“>

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>hi Liam,</p><p>Thanks for the offer, it sounds like you need to get a blog up and running and then post an SnTT entry for us all to enjoy <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$FILE/wink.gif"</a>> </p><p>In the mean time if you do have any things I should be bearing in mind please drop me an email.</p><p>Thanks</p><p>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
hi Liam,

Thanks for the offer, it sounds like you need to get a blog up and running and then post an SnTT entry for us all to enjoy http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$FILE/wink.gif“>

In the mean time if you do have any things I should be bearing in mind please drop me an email.

Thanks

Matt

item.title: By: Liam McLaughlin
item.dc:creator: Liam McLaughlin
item.description: <p>Matt<br/><br/><br/><br/>I'm a regular reader of you blog and often use ideas, suggestions, code etc that you post. So thanks for that...<br/><br/><br/><br/>I have done quite a bit of work on creating PDFs using Apache FOP, XML, XSL from a Notes Java agent that I'm happy to share - I have not got my blog up and running but when I do I intend to post it there.<br/><br/><br/><br/>Let me know if its of any interest<br/><br/><br/><br/>Regards<br/><br/><br/><br/>Liam</p>
item.content:encoded:
Matt

I’m a regular reader of you blog and often use ideas, suggestions, code etc that you post. So thanks for that…

I have done quite a bit of work on creating PDFs using Apache FOP, XML, XSL from a Notes Java agent that I’m happy to share – I have not got my blog up and running but when I do I intend to post it there.

Let me know if its of any interest

Regards

Liam
